org.openimaj.math.model

Class UnivariateGaussianNaiveBayesModel<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.math.model.UnivariateGaussianNaiveBayesModel<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of class/category predicted by the model
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, EstimatableModel<Double,T>, Model<Double,T>

    public class UnivariateGaussianNaiveBayesModel<T>
extends Object
implements EstimatableModel<Double,T>
    An implementation of a EstimatableModel that uses a VectorNaiveBayesCategorizer to associate a univariate (a Double) with a category.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Detail

      • estimate

        public boolean estimate(List<? extends IndependentPair<Double,T>> data)
        Description copied from interface: EstimatableModel
        Estimates the model from the observations in the list of data. The data must contain at least EstimatableModel.numItemsToEstimate() pairs of dependent and independent data. It may contain more, in which case the estimate method may choose to make use of this data for validation, or obtaining a better model by a least squares method for example.
        Specified by:
        estimate in interface EstimatableModel<Double,T>
        Parameters:
        data - Data with which to estimate the model
        Returns:
        true if a successful estimate was made, false otherwise
        See Also:
        EstimatableModel.numItemsToEstimate()

      • predict

        public T predict(Double data)
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Uses the model to predict dependent data from an independent value.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
